verses.verse: "Roam <WH7751> to and fro <WH7751> through the streets <WH2351> of Jerusalem, <WH3389> And look <WH7200> now, <WH4994> and take <WH3045> note. <WH3045> And seek <WH1245> in her open <WH7339> squares, <WH7339> If <WH518> you can find <WH4672> a man, <WH376> If <WH518> there <WH3426> is one who does <WH6213> justice, <WH4941> who seeks <WH1245> truth, <WH530> Then I will pardon <WH5545> her.
"And although <WH518> they say, <WH559> 'As the Lord <WH3068> lives, <WH2416>' Surely <WH3651> they swear <WH7650> falsely. <WH8267>"

O Lord, <WH3068> do not Thine eyes <WH5869> look for truth <WH530>? Thou hast smitten <WH5221> them, [But] they did not weaken; <WH2470> Thou hast consumed <WH3615> them, But they refused <WH3985> to take <WH3947> correction. <WH4148> They have made <WH2388> their faces <WH6440> harder <WH2388> than <WH4480> rock; <WH5553> They have refused <WH3985> to repent. <WH7725>

Then I said, <WH559> "They are only <WH389> the poor, <WH1800> They are foolish; <WH2973> For they do not know <WH3045> the way <WH1870> of the Lord <WH3068> [Or] the ordinance <WH4941> of their God. <WH430>

"I will go <WH1980> to the great <WH1419> And will speak <WH1696> to them, For they know <WH3045> the way <WH1870> of the Lord, <WH3068> [And] the ordinance <WH4941> of their God. <WH430>" But they too, with one <WH3162> accord, <WH3162> have broken <WH7665> the yoke <WH5923> [And] burst <WH5423> the bonds. <WH4147>

Therefore <WH5921> <WH3651> a lion <WH9030> from the forest <WH9194> shall slay <WH5221> them, A wolf <WH2061> of the deserts <WH6160> shall destroy <WH7703> them, A leopard <WH5246> is watching <WH8245> their cities. <WH5892> Everyone <WH3605> who goes <WH3318> out of them shall be torn <WH2963> in pieces, <WH2963> Because <WH3588> their transgressions <WH6588> are many, <WH7231> Their apostasies <WH4878> are numerous. <WH6105>

"Why <WH335> should I pardon <WH5545> you? Your sons <WH1121> have forsaken <WH5800> Me And sworn <WH7650> by those who are not gods. <WH430> When I had fed <WH7646> them to the full, <WH7646> They committed <WH5003> adultery <WH5003> And trooped <WH1413> to the harlot's house. <WH1004>
"They were well-fed lusty <WH7904> horses, <WH5483> Each <WH376> one <WH376> neighing <WH6670> after <WH413> his neighbor's wife. <WH802>
"Shall I not punish <WH6485> these <WH428> [people,]" declares <WH5002> the Lord, <WH3068> "And on a nation <WH1471> such <WH834> as this <WH2088> Shall I not avenge <WH5358> Myself <WH5315>?

"Go <WH5927> up through her vine <WH9595> rows <WH9595> and destroy, <WH7843> But do not execute <WH6213> a complete <WH3617> destruction; <WH3617> Strip <WH5493> away <WH5493> her branches, <WH5189> For they are not the Lord's.
"For the house <WH1004> of Israel <WH3478> and the house <WH1004> of Judah <WH3063> Have dealt <WH898> very <WH898> treacherously <WH898> with Me," declares <WH5002> the Lord. <WH3068>
They have lied <WH3584> about the Lord <WH3068> And said, <WH559> "Not He; Misfortune <WH9567> will not come <WH935> on us; And we will not see <WH7200> sword <WH2719> or famine. <WH7458>
"And the prophets <WH5030> are [as] wind, <WH7307> And the word <WH1699> is not in them. Thus <WH3541> it will be done <WH6213> to them!"

Therefore, <WH3651> thus <WH3541> says <WH559> the Lord, <WH3068> the God <WH430> of hosts, <WH6635> "Because <WH3282> you have spoken <WH1696> this <WH2088> word, <WH1697> Behold, <WH2009> I am making <WH5414> My words <WH1697> in your mouth <WH6310> fire <WH784> And this <WH2088> people <WH5971> wood, <WH6086> and it will consume <WH398> them.

"Behold, <WH2009> I am bringing <WH935> a nation <WH1471> against <WH5921> you from afar, <WH4801> O house <WH1004> of Israel, <WH3478>" declares <WH5002> the Lord. <WH3068> "It is an enduring <WH386> nation, <WH1471> It is an ancient <WH5769> nation, <WH1471> A nation <WH1471> whose language <WH3956> you do not know, <WH3045> Nor <WH3808> can you understand <WH8085> what <WH4100> they say. <WH1696>
"Their quiver <WH827> is like an open <WH6605> grave, <WH6913> All <WH3605> of them are mighty <WH1368> men. <WH1368>

"And they will devour <WH398> your harvest <WH7105> and your food; <WH3899> They will devour <WH398> your sons <WH1121> and your daughters; <WH1323> They will devour <WH398> your flocks <WH6629> and your herds; <WH1241> They will devour <WH398> your vines <WH1612> and your fig <WH8384> trees; <WH8384> They will demolish <WH7567> with the sword <WH2719> your fortified <WH4013> cities <WH5892> in which <WH834> you trust. <WH982>
"Yet even <WH1571> in those <WH1992> days, <WH3117>" declares <WH5002> the Lord, <WH3068> "I will not make <WH6213> you a complete <WH3617> destruction. <WH3617>

"And it shall come <WH1961> about when <WH3588> they say, <WH559> 'Why <WH8478> <WH4100> has the Lord <WH3068> our God <WH430> done <WH6213> all <WH3605> these <WH428> things <WH428> to us?' then you shall say <WH559> to them, 'As you have forsaken <WH5800> Me and served <WH5647> foreign <WH5236> gods <WH430> in your land, <WH776> so <WH3651> you shall serve <WH5647> strangers <WH2114> in a land <WH776> that is not yours.'
"Declare <WH5046> this <WH384> in the house <WH1004> of Jacob <WH3290> And proclaim <WH8085> it in Judah, <WH3063> saying, <WH559>
'Hear <WH8085> this, <WH384> O foolish <WH5530> and senseless <WH369> <WH3820> people, <WH5971> Who have eyes, <WH5869> but see <WH7200> not; Who have ears, <WH241> but hear <WH8085> not.

'Do you not fear <WH3372> Me?' declares <WH5002> the Lord. <WH3068> 'Do you not tremble <WH9123> in My presence <WH6440>? For I have placed <WH7760> the sand <WH2344> as a boundary <WH1366> for the sea, <WH3220> An eternal <WH5769> decree, <WH2706> so it cannot <WH3808> cross <WH5674> over <WH5674> it. Though the waves <WH1530> toss, <WH1607> yet they cannot <WH3808> prevail; <WH3201> Though they roar, <WH1993> yet they cannot <WH3808> cross <WH5674> over <WH5674> it.
'But this <WH2088> people <WH5971> has <WH1961> a stubborn <WH5637> and rebellious <WH4784> heart; <WH3820> They have turned <WH5493> aside <WH5493> and departed. <WH1980>

'They do not say <WH559> in their heart, <WH3824> "Let us now <WH4994> fear <WH3372> the Lord <WH3068> our God, <WH430> Who gives <WH5414> rain <WH1653> in its season, <WH6256> Both the autumn <WH3138> rain <WH3138> and the spring <WH4456> rain, <WH4456> Who keeps <WH8104> for us The appointed <WH2708> weeks <WH7620> of the harvest. <WH7105>"
'Your iniquities <WH5771> have turned <WH5186> these <WH428> away, <WH5186> And your sins <WH9128> have withheld <WH4513> good <WH9185> from you.

'For wicked <WH7563> men <WH7563> are found <WH4672> among My people, <WH5971> They watch <WH7789> like fowlers <WH3353> lying <WH7918> in wait; <WH7918> They set <WH7843> a trap, <WH4889> They catch <WH3920> men. <WH376>

'Like a cage <WH3619> full <WH4392> of birds, <WH5775> So <WH3651> their houses <WH1004> are full <WH4392> of deceit; <WH4820> Therefore <WH5921> <WH3651> they have become <WH1431> great <WH1431> and rich. <WH6238>

'They are fat, <WH8080> they are sleek, <WH6245> They also <WH1571> excel <WH5674> in deeds <WH1697> of wickedness; <WH9563> They do not plead <WH1777> the cause, <WH1779> The cause <WH1779> of the orphan, <WH3490> that they may prosper; <WH6743> And they do not defend <WH8199> the rights <WH4941> of the poor. <WH34>
'Shall I not punish <WH6485> these <WH428> [people?'] declares <WH5002> the Lord, <WH3068> 'On a nation <WH1471> such <WH834> as this <WH2088> Shall I not avenge <WH5358> Myself <WH5315>?'
"An appalling <WH8047> and horrible <WH8186> thing <WH8186> Has happened <WH1961> in the land: <WH776>

The prophets <WH5030> prophesy <WH5012> falsely, <WH8267> And the priests <WH3548> rule <WH7287> on their [own] authority; <WH3027> And My people <WH5971> love <WH157> it so! <WH3651> But what <WH4100> will you do <WH6213> at the end <WH319> of it?
